transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji, ji sir aapko maine link bhej diya hai. Ya toh aapke whatsapp number pe bhi share karu ya mail pe join kar loge?
Executive: Mail pe kar dijiye.
Customer: Mail pe maine bhej diya hai ki number pe jo aapka registered email ID hai IndiaMART se us pe aapko link aagyi hogi.
Customer: Aap phone pe join karenge ya laptop pe join karenge?

Executive: Ji, join kar liya aapne.
Customer: Uh, sir aapne laptop pe join kiya hai ya phone pe join kiya hai?

Customer: Awaz aa rahi hai?

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Awaz aa rahi hai sir aapko?
Executive: Aa gayi ji.
Customer: Ji, ji. Uh, main aapni screen share kar raha hu aapko. Ye aap ye bataiye aapne apne phone se join kiya hai ya laptop se join kiya hai?
Executive: Phone pe.
Customer: Phone se join kiya hai. Aapko meri screen share ho gayi hogi, dikh rahi hogi.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Shyamlal ji bhi hai meeting mein?

Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Rukiye.
Customer: Ye hai apna Prajapati Steel Udyog.
Customer: Ab sir pehli samasya aap mujhe bataiye, pehle samasya kis cheez ki aa rahi hai ki matlab by-lead relevant nahi aa rahi hai ya inquiries kam aa rahi hai, calls kam aa rahi hai, ye bataiye mujhe thodi samasya kis prakar aa rahi hai pehle aapko?
Customer: Samasya lead isme kya hai lead sahi nahi aa rahi hai. Jab baat karte hai unse woh keh rahe hai lead toh hogi done.
Customer: Achha, achha, achha. Is prakar ki samasya jo hai abhi aa rahi hai. Ye apna product hai ek metal metal uh, inclosure box. Iska jo price bata dijiye mujhe aap.

Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji, ji. Ye aapka product hai metal metal hai metal inclosure box. Aapko screen pe dikh raha hoga, mera iska price bata dijiye ek baar sir aap.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Ji?
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Hello? Haan ji bataiye Shyamlal ji.
Executive: Haan ji bolo kya batana hai?
Customer: Ek toh aapko sir ye batana hai iska pricing nahi add hai isme. Metal inclosure box aapko screen pe dikh raha hoga.
Executive: Pricing pricing koi matter nahi rakhta ji hamara mauke ka rate hota hai.
Customer: Chalo, chalo, okay. Chalo ye baat toh sahi hai. Aur ye pricing pricing sahi hai aapki? Dual or highway lighting pole ₹70 per kg.
Executive: Haan, thik hai ji.
Customer: Thik hai, ye toh sahi hai.
Customer: Okay, chalo ye toh baad ki baat hai. Pehle jo main cheeze hai woh dekh lete hai.

Customer: Ji.

Customer: Bhai sahab jo main baat woh hai jo aapki inquiries aap bhej rahe ho woh sahi nahi hoti koi bhi.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Usme 90 90% jisko hum phone karte hai woh kehte hai hamari toh inquiry puri hogi, requirement puri hogi.
Customer: Sir main dekh leta hu. Sabse badi problem ye hai.
Customer: Inquiries ke kitne time baad aap revert karte ho hume? Kitne time baad puchte ho? Matlab ki
Executive: Message ke saath ki saath hi puch lete hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi, main bata deta hu aapko kya hota hai Shyamlal ji. Ki jo ek by-lead aati hai, inquiries karta hai customer agar aap by-lead consume karte ho, by-lead ke agar prospective se main batau toh ek by-lead hoti hai chaar se paanch sellers ke liye.
Customer: Jo ki aap agar time lagaoge.
Executive: Usi dauran karte hai bhai sahab hai. Usi dauran karte hai aane ke baad mein hi karenge ke pehle ghar baithe kar denge.
Customer: Haan bilkul, bilkul.
Executive: Lead aayegi hamare paas toh hi karenge.
Customer: Ye aapki ek inquiry padi hui hai 4 November ki, Karnal se.
Customer: Kitne piece hai?
Customer: Ye dekhiye screen pe dikh rahe honge aapko.
Executive: Haan?
Customer: Screen pe dikh rahe honge sir video meeting mein aapko.
Executive: Haan toh kya kam kitni quantity hai nahi dikh raha na mere ko jab aap baat kar rahe ho toh phir aap hi bata do na phir.
Customer: Ji, ji. 20 piece hai sir isme.
Executive: Haan, kis cheez ke hai?
Customer: Main ek kaam kar raha hu. Main uh, 20 piece ki lead hai sir ye aapki. Ye hai Karnal Karnal se.

Executive: Achha ji.
Customer: Ek aapne sir inquiries toh is mahine aapki dekho thik thak aayi hui hai. Main batau agar aapko.
Customer: Ye dekhiye aap.
Executive: Are bhai sahab maine kab kaha inquiry nahi aati?
Customer: Haan ji bas woh hai aapki problem jo main problem hai.
Executive: Maine ye kabhi bola na inquiry nahi aati.
Customer: Haan haan haan bas main problem jo hai inquiry relevant.
Executive: Inquiries aati hai toh woh unse response toh nahi milta na hamare ko kuch.
Customer: Sir ek kaam karta hu main aapko.
Executive: Kitni aati hai nikalte ho kitni der baad mein check karte ho kitni der baad mein by-lead purchase karte ho?
Customer: Ek kaam kariye sir aap.
Executive: Minute mein karte ye kya condition hoti hai bataiye.
Customer: Ji, ji. Aap apni maine hai na screen share kar rakhi hai aapki. Main call yaha se kaat raha hu aur screen pe aap dekhiye screen jo maine share kar rakhi hai us pe dekhiye aap.
Executive: Dekhiye isko.
Customer: Ji, ji. Us pe dekhiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- By-leads are not relevant.

- Inquiries and calls are less.

- Lead quality is not good.

- 90% of customers say inquiry is complete.



Resolution:

- Executive shared screen to show inquiries.

- Executive explained by-lead distribution to multiple sellers.

- Executive asked customer to check screen share.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, relevance, screen share
